Package NMSCatLib.api.entity

Interface ExtendPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExtendEntity, ExtendLivingEntity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtendNPC
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeExtendNPC, CodeExtendPlayer
    public interface ExtendPlayer
extends ExtendLivingEntity
    擴展玩家
